PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12912017-10-26HC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActRadiation Emitting Devices Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Radiation Emitting Devices Regulations (Dental X-ray Equipment)
PrecisRegulations Amending the RADIATION EMITTING DEVICES REGULATIONS (DENTAL X-RAY EQUIPMENT) in order to (1) strengthen radiation safety requirements, in alignment with International Electrotechnical Commission Standards, for new equipment (i.e. equipment manufactured after the coming into force date of the amended regulations), modern equipment (i.e. more sophisticated types of equipment currently permitted but not adequately addressed under the existing regulations), and new technology (i.e. transportable hand-held equipment that is currently prohibited under the existing regulations); (2) broaden the scope of the Regulations to address new and modern dental X-ray technologies; and (3) require the provision of information to support optimization of equipment use.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0228 Publication Date: 2017-11-15
AttachmentsAttachment
